code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Newsletters=()=>{const[newsletters,setNewsletters]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const[error,setError]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{async function fetchNewsletters(){try{const response=await fetch('http://localhost:8000/newsletters');if(!response.ok)throw new Error(`Failed to fetch newsletters: ${response.statusText}`);const data=await response.json();setNewsletters(data);setLoading(false);}catch(error){setError(error.message);setLoading(false);}}fetchNewsletters();},[]);if(loading){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"text-center text-gray-600",children:"Loading newsletters..."});}if(error){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"text-center text-red-600",children:["Error loading newsletters: ",error]});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"max-w-3xl mx-auto p-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-2xl font-semibold mb-4",children:"All Newsletters"}),newsletters.map(newsletter=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"border border-gray-300 rounded-lg p-4 mb-6 shadow-md",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"text-xl font-bold mb-2",children:newsletter.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-gray-800 mb-4",children:newsletter.content}),newsletter.imageUrl&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:newsletter.imageUrl,className:"w-full h-auto rounded-lg mb-4",alt:"Newsletter"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"text-gray-500 text-sm",children:["Updated on: ",new Date(newsletter.updatedAt).toLocaleDateString()]})]},newsletter.id))]});};export default Newsletters;
